briefTitle: Hypofractionated Whole-breast Irradiation With Simultaneously Integrated Boost For Early-Stage Breast Cancer After Breast-conserving Surgery
officialTitle: Hypofractionated Whole-breast Irradiation With Simultaneously Integrated Boost For Early-Stage Breast Cancer After Breast-conserving Surgery
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Numbers of participants with treatment-related toxicity assessed by CTCAE v4.0
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female
* 18-60 years old
* Treated with breast conversing surgery and sentinel lymph node biopsy or axillary lymph node dissection
* Pathologically confirmed invasive breast cancer
* A pathological T1-2N0M0 tumor
* Tumor bed is labeled with Titanium clips
* Negative surgical margins
* Written informed consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* KPS\<70
* Treated with neoadjuvant chemotherapy
* Sentinel lymph nodes only containing isolated tumour cells (\<0.2 mm)
* With severe comorbidity
* Previous breast cancer or other malignant tumor history
* Previous radiotherapy for breast or thorax
* Medical contraindication for radiotherapy
* Pregnant or nursing
